Description:
Detects user authentication failure events.
Please note that this rule can be noisy and it is recommended to use with correlation based on "author.name" field.


Author: Muhammad Faisal (@faisalusuf)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Bitbucket User Login Failure
Query: sourcetype='bitbucket-audit' eql select * from _source_ where audittype.category = 'authentication' and audittype.action = 'user login failed'
